text: Do you have any favorite colors?  I like yellow and orange myself.  Do you enjoy music?
I enjoy music. For a while, I was in a rock band. Do you like music?
I love rock music.  I also love hip hop and rap.  What kind of band were you in?
I was a drummer in a hard rock band in high school. What do you play?
I play guitar.  Although my favorite instrument is the violin.  How long did you play in your band?
We played in our high school band for about two years. It was a lot of fun. What other things do you enjoy?
I also enjoy working out and reading.  You?  Do any of your other hobbies?
I love to work out and spend time with my cats. How about you? What do your kids like to do?
I love working out.  There is something so rejuvenating about it that I can't get enough of.
What sort of workouts do you like to workout? I also like lifting weights.
Oh, lutfisk is so good! I don't think I've had it since I was young. Do you cook lutfsk often?
Sometimes, I make a lot of desser cuisine when I travel to Sweden
Oh, wow! I would like to go to Switzerland one day. I hear it's very beautiful there.
Yes, it is!  The people are very friendly, and the food is delicious!  What is your favorite desservice there?
My favorite would have to be the pizza, since it's the most popular around the world. What's yours?
I like the pasta dishes a lot.  It's interesting that the term pizza was first documented in the 10th century
It really is! There's even debate about whether pizza was invented in Naples, Italy, or a result of immigration to the New World.
New York style pizza actually originated in New York City in the early 1900's.  But I like mine with tomato sauce and cheese
I like it with vegetables like tomatoes, peppers, onions, and mushrooms.
I like to make mine with a large hand-tossed crust  and lots of cheese
I was hit by a truck, do not wanna talk about it. what do you like to do?
I'm very sorry to hear that. I enjoy reading and watching movies. Yourself?
I do not have much free time with being in a chair. What else do you enjoy?
I play a lot of volleyball. It helps me clear my mind. What do you do for fun?
I play guitar, mostly. I'm not very good though.   Do you have a favorite food?
I love Thai food. How about you? What is your favorite food to eat?
I love Mexican food! One of my favorites is tacos! What is yours?
I also love mexican food. My favorite is tamales. What are your kids favorite foods?
My kids like all kinds of food, but I try to make healthy food for them.  Tamales are great!
I agree! I like to cook healthy meals as well. What kind of healthy foods do you cook?
Vermont seems like an awesome place to live. Do you surf or ride the waves?
both . i really enjoy both . are you a surfer ? what do you do for a living ?
No, I'm not a surfboarder. I work at a restaurant, I love deli sandwiches. What do you like to do?
I love to listen to Pearl Jam and surf on the weekends.  What do people usually order at a deli?
usually sandwiched with extra cheese and cooked in an oven. what kind of sandwich do you prefer?
I love a cheeseburger with lettuce, onion, tomatoe, bacon, and cheese!
that sounds delicious. i love a variety of cheeses like provolone and mozzarella
I like those too.  I like cheddar and american cheese.  Do you like pizza?
i do! i love pineapple, pepperoni and jalapeños
Me too!  I also like stuffed crust.  How do you feel about pine apple?
Why only in video games? What's your favorite video game?    My biggest fear is height.
What is it about heights that scares you?  I'm 5'5 and I love it.
I just don't like feeling claustrophobic. Do you have any other phobias?
I do not, other than being confined in my bed and having to work from there. How about you?
I'm terrified of heights, but I'm not afraid of needles. Have you ever had one?
No, I have never had one. Do they hurt?  Have you had any surgery?
Sometimes they do. I've had a lot of surgeries but that isn't a problem for me.
I see.  What kind of surgery did you have?  Amphetic?  Or what?
I had knee surgery. It is a surgery that involves removing bone and muscle tissue.
Oh that sounds painful.  How long ago was that?  How is your recovery going?
I know how you feel, I'm glad I went to school rather than home school. It was tough.
What did you go to school for if you don't mind me asking? I want to be a pilot
I went for accounting, how is that going for you? What will you be flying?
I'm still studying to be an airline pilot but I'm going to be flying commercial airlines
That sounds really cool, airplanes are really interesting to watch. What is it that you like about flying so much?
I'm fascinated by the aviation industry. I don't know, it's just fascinating. Do you like watching planes fly?
I do! Do you enjoy watching nature fly?  I love watching the clouds move.
I do enjoy watching them too! Clouds are so beautiful. Where do you fly to?
I fly all over the world because it's so expensive.  What is your favorite part about flying?
I love the fact that it's a long, clear day. It's very relaxing.
What do you do for a living? I own my own nail salon where I keep my own colorful hair.
That's awesome,what kind of colored hair do you have? I work as a family business.
I have purple hair. I do some side work as well. What do your family do?
My family owns a salon. My father is a dentist and mother is a nurse. Whats your favorite color?
My favorite color is yellow. It reminds me of sunsets, summertime is my favorite season.
I love the fall myself, especially pumpkins.  Yellow is a pretty color.
I love to eat pumpkin spice everything!   Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I do. A twin brother and a sister. How about you? .
I've a twin sister as well! We were very close when we were younger. .
That's nice. I've never been able to have a close relationship with my sister.  What about you
That's disappointing. What happened? Did you have a hard time obtaining a higher credit score?
Not really. I just got stuck with a credit line that I wasn't proud of.  I am 19 and live with my parents
Do you have any hobbies that you could take your mind off of it for a while? What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to pnb rocks music.  What about you?  What do u like?
I like listening to Emo music. It's like my favorite genre of music. Have you ever heard of them?
I have heard of it.  Its a little too much for me.  Do u go to concerts?
I used to, but now I can't find any good ones. What kind of music do you prefer?
Mostly pop and rock.  Punk is my favorite.  Who is your favorite band?
I'm not too picky. I don't really have a favorite. Do you like football?
I do.  My favorite team is the Seattle Seahawks.  How about you?!
How do you feel about dairies?  It is part of our family.  I love it.
I love dairy and try to eat it a few times a week. I also love the taste of ice cream!
I love ice cream too.  It has been around as long as it has been made.  Does your family like farms?
My family likes farms and lots of animals. We raise pigs, chickens, sheep, goats, and even fish.
That sounds like a lot of animals to take care of.  How does that make you feel?
I think it is important to take good care of them. It can make life worth living. Do you have any kids?
I do not.  What about you?  Do you like kids?  I would love to have some!
I do like kids, I just don't have any. I want to have at least one, though.
That is great.  Have you been married for a long time?  Are you still in school?
Yes, I have been married to my husband for 13 years. I am done with school. Are you married?
I agree.  It's good to have a good relationship with your sibling.  A lot of people neglect their sibings.
Yes, I agree with you! It is good to take time with family.  How many sibs do you have?
I have two brothers.  You?  How about you?  Do you have any sibles?
I've two older brothers, and one younger brother. I have a lot of brothers!
How many brothers do your sisters have? I have 3 sisters.  Do they get along with your brothers?
They do get along. I like having siblical relationships with them. How about yours?
I have always been the eldest, and my brothers and I have been best friends for as long as I can remember.
What is your favorite part about being the oldest? I've always been an only child.
My favorite part of being the elderly is my family. They're always there for me.
It is always nice to have family, isn't it? I don't have any other sibilings, other than my parents.
I like it both ways depending on the time of day and what I'm eating.  Do you like bacon?
I do, I like my bacon crisp in the form of a thick slice of bacon. What do you like to eat?
Eggs and baconn.  I eat it every morning.  Now I'm hungry.  How about you?
I love it too. I have trouble getting up in the morning so I often eat it early in the day so I don't feel too hungry.
I'm the opposite.  My goal in life is to get up and get a good meal in the early morning.
I would love to have a good breakfast. My breakfast usually consists of a piece of toast and a glass of milk.
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day.  Since it's the first meal of a day.
I usually eat it in the afternoon. I like to have mine with bacon and eggs.
That's nice.  Bacon is a great breakfast food.  It's usually eaten as a dinner food in some countries.
I know. I can't eat much of it because of my high cholesterol.
I have two cats and a dog. I love animals. What about you?   Do you have pets?
Yes, I have a dog and cat. I also have chickens. Do you eat meat?
Yes, i love meat. I would like to have a farm someday. How long have you had them?
4 years now. I herd the cattle on my own. What do you do for a living?
I'm currently unemployed. I do some freelance work online, though. What job do you have?
I work in the music business. I'm a singer. What kind of work do you like?
I like acting and working with kids. I hope to find a job in that field soon. What bands do you sing?
I sing a little bit of everything. What else do you enjoy doing?  Do have any hobbies?
Well, I am a big gamer. How about you, do you play video games?
I don't play video game often. It's a good way to relieve stress. What's your favorite game?
Aww, that's great! Do you know if she knows that you love her?
Yes she knows and we go out on the lake often.  What do you do for fun?
I like to go fishing a lot. Its one of my favorite things to do in the summer.
Sounds like a great time, I'd really like to try fishing one day.  How long have you been doing it?
about 7 years now. i really enjoy it.  what is your favorite type of fish to catch?
I love freshwater fishing, especially trout.  Do you have a favorite type?
trout are the best.  i also like bass, salmon, and large mouth.
Bass is great!  I also like catch and release fishing.  I never eat any of the fish I catch.
do you ever catch and eat them yourself? i really like salmon and trout, but i've never caught any other fish.
I do catch and cook fish.  It's a little more work but it's worth it.
Freckles are not ugly, I have some myself.  What is your favorite type of food?
I love indian and chinese food. What is yours? And what type of music do you like?
I love Chick-fil-A, Chicken Tikka masala, and French Fries.  I like all kinds of music, except country.  How about you?
I don't mind country music. Do you have any pets? I've a dog named Tiki.
I don' have any animals.  Where do you live?  I live in the south.
I live on the west coast. Have you been to the beach recently? I really want to go.
Not recently.  Last time I went was a few years ago.  It was very relaxing.
Where did you go? Have you ever been to Florida? I hope to visit there one day.
I've been to Orlando, which is where Disney World is.  That was very fun.  Do you like Disney?
I have never been there. I've only been to California, Texas, and Arizona.
I do. I have a yacht that I take out every weekend. What about you?
I have no yachts, just a car and a ferrari, but it is still my favorite thing to do.
That is awesome. What Ferraris do you own? I want to buy a Ferris.
I actually do not own a firrari.  My dad used to buy them for me when I was little though.
That is very sweet. My boss bought me a new car last year. It is a toyota corolla.
That is sweet.  I've never driven a corollah.  Are you happy with it?
I love it! It is very comfortable for driving long distances. Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love playing the piano and singing.  Do you play any instruments?
I love singing, it is one of the few things I am good at. I do not play any musical instruments.
That is great!  I wish I was better.  What kind of music do you like to sing?
Yes, it was bad. I thought I'd never be able to get the smell off me.
Yeah that must have been terrible. I'm sorry you had to deal with that. Babies can be so nasty when they are little.
I was so grossed out! I cannot understand how parents can handle that!  How old is your son?
He is 16. He's starting kindergarten this year. How old are you?
I'm 28.  I have a 4 year old and she just started kindergarden last year.
That's great. I wish my son was old enough to go to kindergaten. What is your favorite subject in school?
My favorite subject is science.  What about yours?  What's your favorite?  I hate math, it makes me feel stupid.
I love chemistry. It was my favorite class. Have you ever taken biology before?
No, I haven't.  How was that class?  Did you like it?  Is it interesting?
It was okay. It's a hard class but I thought it was interesting. What kind of music do you like?
I'm sorry to hear that. What sort of issues? How many children did you have?
I had some very bad health issues. I ended up having seven children. It was a big life change.
Oh wow, I can only imagine how hard that must have been. I'm glad you're doing better now, though!
Thank you! Now, I'm working as a nurse in a hospital. How about you?
I actually work in a nursing home. What a rewarding job you have! I love helping people!
I also volunteer with the elderly at the local animal shelter. It's very rewarding.
That's such a great thing to do. It must be rewarding to help such nice people.
Yes, I love it. Do you have a favorite animal? Mine is a puppy! Do you like pets?
I love cats! I used to have one. How long have you had your puppy?
My puppy is about 2.5 years old. What kind of pup did you own?
My grandchildren love to hike in the mountains.  Do you do that much hiking?
My husband and I like to go on long hikes, usually in the foothills of the Appalachian National Scenic Trail. What do you like to do?
I like playing basketball.  My favorite team is the Denver Bullets.  I was excited when they won the NBA championship in 2005.
I would not have expected them to win the NBA in 2004. Do you think they will win it this year?
I think they have a good chance.  They've been working hard this year.  How about you?
Yes, they have been working really hard! I think the team will win this year as well.
That would be great.  Are you a fan of any other NBA teams?  Or just the Bulls?
I like the Lakers and of course the Cavs as well! Who is your favorite team?
Lebron James and the Los Angeles Lakers are my favorite.  You?  The Lakers have been my favorite for years.  What about you??
I like them too. I like how Kobe Bryant plays for them as well, since he is so good.
I guess that's true.  It's hard to top a classic.    Do you like music?
I do.  I like a lot of different music.  What kind of music do you like?
I like rock, do you have a favorite band? I like Led Zeppelin.
That's a good one.  My favorite is Jimmy Hendrix.  Have you heard of him?
No, I haven't.  He was an American guitarist, bassist and vocalist.
That's cool.  Do have a dog?  My dog is really important to me.
Yes, I have two miniature pinschers.  They are great dogs.  Are you married?
Yes, for 10 years.  How long have you been married?  What are your dogs names?
My husband and I have been married 10 years and we have a maltese dog named bella.
Aw, that's adorable.  Congratulations!  What type of dog is Bella?
I don't have a lot of time to watch movies, since my schedule is pretty busy with school.
Makes sense. I wish I had time for school too. I've worked 3 different jobs, so I don;t get to see much.
What kind of work do you do? Do you like it? What do you think of it?
I'm an accountant, and I like it well enough. Some days are more busy than others though.
I see, how long have you been an accountants? And does your work have long hours?
I've been an auditor for about five years. No, my job does not have long work hours.
That's great, you must have a ton of energy. What else do you like to do?
I like to hike. My favorite trails are in the Rocky Mountains. You?
I love hiking, especially in the mountains. I like Colorado and the Rockies.
I really like hiking in Colorodo too. What do your parents do for a living?
